message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,000,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations and be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can come to an agreement closer to my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $750,000.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the price. To find a middle ground, I propose a price of $925,000. This reflects the true value of the product while acknowledging your interest.
Thank you for your proposal, Alice. I appreciate the effort to meet in the middle. I would like to counter with a price of $875,000.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $900,000. I believe this is a fair and attractive price considering the value you'll gain from this product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I am willing to consider $880,000 as a counteroffer.
